name: Grilled Lemon Herb Chicken
instructions: In a small bowl, mix olive oil, lemon juice, minced garlic, chopped parsley, salt, and pepper.
Marinate chicken breasts in the mixture for at least 15 minutes.
Heat a grill or grill pan over medium heat. Grill chicken for 6-8 minutes per side, or until fully cooked.
Serve hot with a side of vegetables or salad.

name: Chicken Stir-Fry
instructions: Cut chicken into bite-sized pieces. Slice bell peppers into strips.
In a small bowl, mix soy sauce, minced garlic, grated ginger, sesame oil, cornstarch, and water to make the sauce.
Heat a wok or skillet over medium-high heat. Cook chicken until browned and cooked through.
Add bell peppers and stir-fry for 3-5 minutes.
Pour the sauce over the chicken and vegetables. Cook until the sauce thickens.
Serve hot with steamed rice or noodles.
notes: Add broccoli or snap peas for extra veggies.

name: Creamy Fettuccine Alfredo

In a large skillet, melt butter over medium heat. Add minced garlic and saut√© until fragrant.
Stir in heavy cream and bring to a gentle simmer.
Gradually whisk in Parmesan cheese until smooth and creamy.
Toss cooked fettuccine in the sauce. Season with salt and pepper.
Serve immediately, garnished with extra Parmesan if desired.
notes: Add cooked chicken or shrimp for a protein boost.
